snippet: The United States had 57 cases of plague in the last decade, putting it far behind the worst-affected nations in Africa, but still 11th in the world.
abstract: Survey published by American Journal of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene shows that United States now ranks 11th in world in cases of plague, and is only wealthy country on list.
lead_paragraph: The United States had 57 cases of plague in the last decade, putting it far behind the worst-affected nations in Africa, but still 11th in the world.

headline.main: United States Ranks 11th in Plague Cases Worldwide

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Journal of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene
